title: mystery gothic condensed sans serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gothic_3686.jpg)
  
would really appreciate your expert help! it's the 'N' and 'M' that are throwing me, they look 'off'...  
please help!  
tash
author: tashddl

comments.content: Find My Font says it is Bebas (Regular) from Dafont.com
FindMyFont is wrong, this is not Bebas, /R is totally different (as /M, /C...).
proportion-wise, it's frustratingly close to berthold akzidenz grotesk condensed with a hefty stroke...(?)...

If not Bebas Regular it is close - see this screen shot

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025154509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CompareFonts_4780.jpg)
